io.github.teamfractal.entity

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.teamfractal.entity.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds all data relating to a single player and implements the logic required for players to buy and sell to/from the market and other players, aquire land and make that land produce resources
